attributes.action: ask local councils to pay mps salaries from their local revenues instead of from the tax payers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the prime minister to ask local councils to pay mps salaries and expenses instead of central government making these payments.each council will control their salaries and expenses according to their finances and mps will be liable to pay normal taxes as anyone else after any allowances allowed.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
